trans-unit.source: For comparing the values calculated for the relevant data slices.

seg-source.mrk: For comparing the values calculated for the relevant data slices.

target.mrk: 用于比较为相关数据段计算的值。

trans-unit.source: An equation defined using left- and right-hand matching fields, a comparison operator, and optionally, conversion functions. Matching expressions are used for comparing the values calculated for the relevant data slices. By default, when you choose the left-hand field, the same field on the right hand is selected automatically provided the second slice has the same field. However, the two sides don't have to be with a same field but a same data type.

seg-source.mrk: An equation defined using left- and right-hand matching fields, a comparison operator, and optionally, conversion functions.
Matching expressions are used for comparing the values calculated for the relevant data slices.
By default, when you choose the left-hand field, the same field on the right hand is selected automatically provided the second slice has the same field.
However, the two sides don't have to be with a same field but a same data type.

target.mrk: 使用左手和右手匹配字段、比较运算符和可选的转换功能定义的等式。
匹配表达式用于比较为相关数据段计算的值。
缺省情况下，当您选择左手字段时，如果第二个段具有相同的字段，则会自动选择右手的相同字段。
但是，双方不必具有相同的字段，而是具有相同的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: Matching expression is not needed for matching rules with the match type <uicontrol>Group as Assigned</uicontrol> or <uicontrol>Group as Matched</uicontrol>. And it is also not mandatory for the other three match types. For example, if a matching rule with the type <uicontrol>Auto-Assign</uicontrol> doesn’t have any matching expressions, it means all the items filtered by the two slices are grouped under one assignment.

seg-source.mrk: Matching expression is not needed for matching rules with the match type <uicontrol>Group as Assigned</uicontrol> or <uicontrol>Group as Matched</uicontrol>.
And it is also not mandatory for the other three match types.

For example, if a matching rule with the type <uicontrol>Auto-Assign</uicontrol> doesn’t have any matching expressions, it means all the items filtered by the two slices are grouped under one assignment.

target.mrk: 匹配规则不需要匹配类型为<uicontrol>分组为已分配</uicontrol>或<uicontrol>分组为已匹配</uicontrol>的匹配规则。
并且对于其他三种匹配类型也不是必需的。
例如，如果具有<uicontrol>自动分配</uicontrol>类型的匹配规则没有任何匹配的表达式，则表示由两个段过滤的所有项目都在一个分配下分组。

trans-unit.source: The <uicontrol>Function</uicontrol> column allows you to make conversions for the values of matching fields. It is data-type-dependent, for example, we provide “<sap-technical-name translate="no">SUBSTRING</sap-technical-name>” for string-like fields and “<sap-technical-name translate="no">CONVERT_CURRENCY</sap-technical-name>” for amount-type fields.

seg-source.mrk: The <uicontrol>Function</uicontrol> column allows you to make conversions for the values of matching fields.

It is data-type-dependent, for example, we provide “<sap-technical-name translate="no">SUBSTRING</sap-technical-name>” for string-like fields and “<sap-technical-name translate="no">CONVERT_CURRENCY</sap-technical-name>” for amount-type fields.

target.mrk: <uicontrol>函数</uicontrol>列允许您对匹配字段的值进行转换。
功能列是与数据类型相关的，例如，我们为类似字符串的字段提供“<sap-technical-name translate="no">SUBSTRING</sap-technical-name>”，为金额类型字段提供“<sap-technical-name translate="no">CONVERT_CURRENCY</sap-technical-name>”。

trans-unit.source: Comparison operators are also data-type-dependent. For numeric fields, “<sap-technical-name translate="no">OPPOSITE</sap-technical-name>” and “<sap-technical-name translate="no">TOLERANCE</sap-technical-name>” are available in addition to the common operators such as “=”, “>”, “<>” and so on.

seg-source.mrk: For numeric fields, “<sap-technical-name translate="no">OPPOSITE</sap-technical-name>” and “<sap-technical-name translate="no">TOLERANCE</sap-technical-name>” are available in addition to the common operators such as “=”, “>”, “<>” and so on.

target.mrk: 比较运算符也是与数据类型相关的。
对于数字字段，除了 “=”、“>”、“<>” 等常用的运算符之外，还可以使用 “<sap-technical-name translate="no">OPPOSITE</sap-technical-name>” 和 “<sap-technical-name translate="no">TOLERANCE</sap-technical-name>”。
